Summary: i know it wasnt from here ive never seen any thing come in to earth from space on fire then just stop in mid air and there was 2 ive never seen any thing like what i seen
divs: Sighting Detailsi have pic if you need them thay look cool i walked out my door and seen 3 lights thay looked like this and i know theres no stars like it and then i seen 2 more come in earth on fire and then stop were the other 3 was and then the 2 at the bottom started going up and down all i had was a cell phone but i loaded the pic on my computer and you can see them good 1 was round and looked like it had a window that was lite up and 1 of the bigger ones is glowing and looks like 2 orbes on left and right side the other had 2 pointed wings and a bubble on top then about 30 mins after thay took off there was 15 hellis and plains there thay had strobe lights the other 5 didnt thay just glowed and i would say thay was around 60,000 feet and big if you want pics let me know ill sent them i have 2 with 2 ships in each and i watch your show all the time and i know theres more life then here theres to many stars for us to be alone but ill send pics if you want all you have 2 do is zoom in and you,ll see and i dont have the stuff to clean pic to clean up but i think you will like it thanks for looking in to it and ill be out looking tonight to have a great day ill send 1 that shows how thay were when i seen them and you will know ill just paint 1 and send it
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
